name: Death Tour
description:
You will be the last company of an old soul, who wants to leave this world with dignity.

Your objective is to pick up the 3 elements for the ritual, but be carefull, spirits from another dimension will haunt for the old man, and you must change to the spirits world to trap them in the limbo.

Move with W A S D

Pick with E

Change to the other dimension with Q

Check the map with M or ESC

Send your enemies to the limbo with Space

Have fun!
